root.title: Azure Suppression Rule Created
root.description: Identifies when a suppression rule is created in Azure. Adversary's could attempt this to evade detection.
root.author: Austin Songer

falsepositives.item: Suppression Rule being created may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Suppression Rule created from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
